comment_text: Venus is in the Goldilocks Zone as well. :-o

Interesting how this is all stated as fact, when it is in fact, theory.  For example, the theory of why earth has a magnetic field, or the theory that Mars used to have one, and that it "lost" it 4 billion years ago, at which time, all the water "boiled away" from its surface.  While it is true that you can't set out to prove something without first hypothesizing, it doesn't mean you should present a hypothesis as fact.
